channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Klaviyo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Klaviyo

item.title: CVE-2023-0874|2024-08-02T05:24:34.703Z -- unknown -- klaviyo
item.description: The Klaviyo WordPress plugin before 3.0.10 does not sanitize and escape some of its settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
